title: Zimbabwe: Harare Duo in Court Over Whatsapp Hijacking Scam
desc: Two Harare men appeared in court for allegedly hacking Artemis Herbal Centre (Pvt) Limited's WhatsApp groups to seize administrative control and falsely advertise services such as forex trading, commodity broking, and property evaluations all of which fall outside the company's actual line of business.

title: Kristen Stewart Will Likely Leave US Because of Donald Trump
desc: Kristen Stewart recently revealed that she might consider leaving the United States if President Donald Trump continues imposing harsh tariffs on films made outside the country. She said the situation makes it difficult for her to work freely in the U.S., and she hopes to continue making films in Europe. title: Tanzania invites Korean investors to boost the mining sector
desc: DODOMA: THE Tanzanian government has welcomed South Korean companies to invest in the country’s mining sector, opening the door to partnerships in mineral exploration, value addition, and modern extraction and processing technologies, particularly for strategic and critical minerals. The announcement was made in Dodoma by the Deputy Secretary General of the Ministry of Minerals, Msafiri
